blurb: Visualization of underwater vortices reveals how fish make the best of a swirilng situation
description: Marine animals face a lot of potential issues when swimming through the water. One wrong turn, and you could end up as someone else’s next meal. Not turning enough could result in bumping into a lot of things. But there is one important feature found everywhere that they have to face almost all the time, and this feature is rarely seen – vortices.
title: Going with the Flow
